data.title: Canada's Erica Evans on 'dream' of seeing lacrosse in Olympics
data.meta_description: Canada has won two world titles in womenâs lacrosse, and Erica Evans was part of both. Still, her sport's recent addition to the Olympic schedule is enough to bring her to tears.
